abstract: Citigroup‘s stock price may be plumbing new depths, but Citi’s bankers are apparently doing a bang-up job landing deals, especially considering the state of the market.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s stock price may be plumbing new depths, but Citi’s bankers are apparently doing a bang-up job landing deals, especially considering the state of the market.

headline.main: In M&A, at Least, Citi Is on Top
